title: Leadership Practical Competency Enhancement: Foundations of Financial Modeling Using Semi-Supervised Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Requirement of intermediate theoretical background and practical experience
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for Corporate Management/HR Professionals

learning_goals: Explain at least three concepts and application cases of semi-supervised learning in financial modeling
Improve and validate MRE-based models using small-scale labeled data
Apply semi-supervised learning models to real-life financial scenarios (e.g., distressed debt recovery) to improve prediction accuracy by at least 15%
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
